data.eml:eml: A new frog species of the genus Rugosa from Sado Island, Japan (Anura, Ranidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sekiya, Kunio, Miura, Ikuo, Ogata, Mitsuaki (2012): A new frog species of the genus Rugosa from Sado Island, Japan (Anura, Ranidae). Zootaxa 3575: 49-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214634
